Yep

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 29, 2009 1:21 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: first time with frank's box





        LOL, that good! I agree also=
, its the intentions and subconscious fears and motives that are dangerous.=
 The same spirits you would call to a board are present without it.

      =
  Frank R.

        --- On Mon, 6/29/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercromb=
ieghostresearch.com> wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@aber=
crombieghostresearch.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: first time w=
ith frank's box
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Monda=
y, June 29, 2009, 1:33 PM


          I agree-Ouija' s are not dangerous. I=
t is people's own minds that are dangerous.

          In other words - Oui=
ja Boards don't kill people, people kill people.

            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: purplespacefriend 
            To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Monday, June 29, 2009 12:28 PM
     =
       Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: first time with frank's box


            I u=
se mine at home, in the basement, with the lights on. You don't have to go =
the "haunted" locations, spirits and entities are everywhere, and they trav=
el, they will come to use if you announce you're doing EVP sesssions. Of co=
urse--I make my own boxes. 

            I don't see how a ouija is dangero=
us. 

            Frank-S
